page.title: 20Recreation in Charnwood
page.content:
The Structure Plan quotes"Renowned for its crags and rugged beauty a major recreation source for local population". The pattern of undulating roads allows car riders to enjoy the area.A birds eye view from a microlite shows people walking,rambling,jogging, rock climbing,cycling,kite and model aircraft flying,picnickers at Broombriggs Farm and the Beacon, naturalists in the reserves. There are those enjoying horse riding or fox hunting with the Quorn Hunt on a Tuesday. Seasonal weather always brings a crop of winter sports.
Information collected,photographs taken and text written by members of Newtown Linford W.I. Typing by Richard Cook & Mrs J Cook. Thanks to Mr & Mrs A Cook for the use of their computer.
